full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'OD DPAG MED PA'I SGRUB THABS BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,BSANGS GSER SKYEMS BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,KHYAD PAR AUR GNON BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,KUN RIGS CHU SHEL DBANG PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES BSNGO BA SMON LAM CI RIGS @002B BYA'O, ,ZHES 'OD DPAG MED KYI SGRUB THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA 'DI NI DAD SHER DANG LDAN PA'I THU NU MAL DAR KHAN DGE SLONG GI 'DOD PA LTAR, ,DZA YI PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SKAD GNYIS SMRA BA SOGS CHOS LA BLO MIG RGYAS PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG DON GRUB AER TE NI KU SHR'I'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
